titleStmt.title: Cantus [Altus, Tenor, Bassus, Quintus] madrigales to 3, 4, and 5 parts : apt for viols and voices / newly composed by Michael Este.
Madrigals, 1st set
titleStmt.author: East, Michael, ca. 1580-1648.

notesStmt.note: Title printed within ornamental border; initials.
Imperfect: item at 577:12 is cantus and tenor only; item at reel 1894:1 stained, with loss of print.
Signatures: v.1, 4, 5: A², B-D⁴; v.2: A², B⁴; v.3: A², B-C⁴.
Reproductions of originals in Folger Shakespeare Library and Library of Congress.
